articles.author: Tushar Kelshikar
articles.title: Polaris RZR Pro R Sport launched at Rs. 59 lakh - Team-BHP
articles.description: Polaris has launched the RZR Pro R Sport in India, priced at Rs. 59 lakh (ex-showroom). The RZR Pro R Sport is a four-wheel drive ATV measuring 1,880 mm in length and having a ground clearance of 406 mm. It has 2-seats and an integrated roll cage.
articles.content:
